note:
British retired in Spain.

Former expatriate in East Africa. Lived for many years in Kenya and Tanzania and worked there and in Ethiopia, Uganda, Zambia and Mauritius.

Malting and agriculture (barley, tea and sisal).

Interests: cycling, our rescue dogs, bird watching, travel, tinkering with computers, photography, reading, simple cooking.

Photos are my own unless reposted. I retain the copyright to mine.

After a lifetime of voting conservative, I am now anti-Tory. I find them more repulsive by the day.
